segments.text: Good afternoon , ma'am . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Can I deposit valuables here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , you can . Please put your articles in this bag and seal it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Here is your tag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me the rate per day for depositing my bag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This cloakroom is open until 10 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dear ! I won't be back until about 11:30 tonight . Where can I pick up my bag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will transfer your bag to the Lobby Floor Cloakroom . You may collect it there , madam .
segments.speaker: S1
